content: Which character in a novel by Charles Dickens is known for saying "Please sir, I want some more"?

The character who says, "Please sir, I want some more" is Oliver Twist in Charles Dickens' novel "Oliver Twist." This quote is particularly famous as it is one of the first things Oliver says when he asks for additional food at the workhouse, which sets the tone for his character and the themes of poverty and desperation in the novel.
